subtitle:
I mentor and share knowledge through lessons, educational content, masterclasses, and lectures. 

I have extensive experience (200+ individual students, 2 years of courses at Musical Wave) and a personal ed-tech method that sensitively combines a systematic approach, creative freedom, and dialogue.
